name: David Brabham
introduction: David Brabham (born September 5, 1965 in Wimbledon, United Kingdom) is a British-born Australian racing driver, the youngest son of three-time World Champion Jack Brabham. His brother Gary Brabham also raced in Formula One for the unsuccessful Life team in 1990, the same year as David's F1 debut.  Another brother, Geoff, did not race in F1. In 2009, Brabham won the 24 Hours of Le Mans.
